response.original_title: ECW Heatwave 1994 - The Battle for The Future
response.overview: Heatwave '94: the Battle for the Future was the first Heatwave professional wrestling event produced by Eastern Championship Wrestling (ECW). It took place on July 16, 1994 in the ECW Arena in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania in the United States.
response.title: ECW Heatwave 1994 - The Battle for The Future
